text: Leo Wilden (3 July 1936 - 5 May 2022) was a German football player. He played for West Germany national team. Wilden died on 5 May 2022 in Cologne, Germany at the age of 85.Der FC trauert um Leo Wilden ==Club career statistics== |- |1958–59||rowspan="8"|Köln||rowspan="5"|Oberliga||7||0 |- |1959–60||30||0 |- |1960–61||27||0 |- |1961–62||26||1 |- |1962–63||29||0 |- |1963–64||rowspan="3"|Bundesliga||29||1 |- |1964–65||22||0 |- |1965–66||12||0 |- |1966–67||rowspan="3"|Bayer Leverkusen||rowspan="3"|Regionalliga||32||0 |- |1967–68||34||1 |- |1968–69||29||2 277||5 277||5 |} ==International career statistics== |- |1960||3||0 |- |1961||3||0 |- |1962||3||0 |- |1963||4||0 |- |1964||2||0 |- !Total||15||0 |} ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Sportspeople from North Rhine-Westphalia
